title: NAF Veibok
text: NAF Veibok is a triannual publication issued by the <a href="Norwegian%20Automobile%20Federation">Norwegian Automobile Federation</a>. The book contains <a href="Road%20atlas">road maps</a>, route descriptions and other road information. The first edition of the book came in 1928. The 29th edition, published in 2010, contains a total of about 800 pages, including an <a href="atlas">atlas</a> of 136 map pages of a scale of 1:400,000, covering the Norwegian mainland.
